projects.name: Internal System PT Arindo Utama Perkasa - Ongoing Project
projects.description: Internal System PT Arindo Utama Perkasa is a system designed to facilitate the management of company data, from the management of company employees, customers, products, and other data.

projects.name: Internal System CV Aliansyah ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) - Ongoing Project
projects.description: Internal System Aliansyah ERP is a system designed to facilitate the management of company data, from the management of company employees, customers, suppliers, products, sales, purchases, and other data.

projects.name: PPS Fathul Ulum CMS (Content Management System) - 2024
projects.description: PPS Fathul Ulum CMS is a Content Management System (CMS) designed to facilitate the management of school websites, from the management of school profiles, news, events, galleries, and other content.

projects.name: PPDB PPS Fathul Ulum (New Student Admissions) - 2024
projects.description: PPDB PPS Fathul Ulum is a service system designed to facilitate the automation of the implementation of New Student Admissions (PPDB), from the new student registration process, selection to announcement of selection results through the system.

projects.name: Luluk Store (POS) System - 2023
projects.description: Luluk Store (POS) System is basically a management system for store, where a system user can add, update and delete item from menu and generate bills.

projects.name: Navisya Mart (POS) System - 2023
projects.description: Navisya Mart (POS) System is basically a management system for store, where a system user can add, update and delete item from menu and generate bills.

projects.name: Apotek Vina Point Of Sales (POS) System - 2023
projects.description: Point of Sale (POS) System is basically a management system for store, where a system user can add, update and delete item from menu and generate bills.

projects.name: Eshop RESTful API - Ongoing Project
projects.description: Eshop RESTful API is a RESTful API designed to facilitate the management of e-commerce data, from the management of products, categories, orders, customers, and other data.

projects.name: Wild vs No Wild Classification (CNN) - 2022
projects.description: Wild vs No Wild : Flask app Using Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to recognize wild vs no wild animal with very high accuracy up to 95%
